DOC.brief_summary: A single group of pregnant women who was analyzed in the first and in the third trimesters of pregnancy
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Exposures of the Mother-infant Pair to the Air Pollution of SÃ£o Paulo
DOC.detailed_description: A single group of 120 pregnant women separated in smokers (n = 17) and nonsmokers (n = 103) and first pregnancy (n = 54) or multiparous (n = 66) who underwent pulmonary function test and used the individual passive sampler in the first and third trimesters of pregnancy
DOC.criteria: prior informed consent; single pregnancy; topical and feasible; gestational age of less than 13.86 weeks at the first evaluation; absence of preexisting maternal diseases withdrawal from the project; abortion; inadequate pulmonary function test
